column1: #Text=Mako says : " So , how do you know where Wu is just by touching some spirit vines ? "
#Text=Korra says : " I learned how to connect to people 's energies through them . "
#Text=" Korra says : " A cranky , more miserable version of Lin .
#Text=" Mako says : " Is that even possible ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Which train is Wu on ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't know !
#Text=" Mako says : " Split up and start looking .
